name: storehouse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large building for storing things, often before they are sold, used, or sent out to shops: The goods have been sitting in a storehouse for months because a strike has prevented distribution. Todays libraries are more than just storehouses for books.

store

warehousing
a storehouse of something
something that provides a lot of information, ideas, memories, etc.: The Internet is a storehouse of electronic information.
